# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=60.0 y=-60.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Copper plate transportation system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Boiler system at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Electricity generation system at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of following entities
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Inserter system at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not out of fuel.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not out of ingredients.

### Errors when using entities that are not connected
- Ensure that entities are properly connected before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are connected.

### Errors when using entities that are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that entities are properly plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are plugged into the electric network.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked.
Important variables that have been assigned:
* entity positions (x, y)
* entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
* entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace, burner-inserter)
